column1: Funeral services for Wanda will be conducted Sunday
column3: 2015 at 7:00 p.m. from the Charles B. Hux Memorial Chapel with Rev. Richard Stout and Rev. Ray Vaught officiating. Visitation will be from 5:00 p. m. until 7:00 p.m. prior to the funeral service. Graveside services will be at 11:00 a.m. Monday
column5: 2015 from the Hammons Cemetery. At other times friends may call the residence at 128 Antioch Road
